USER STORY: As an admin, I need to be able to add, delete and reorder nodes so I can manage the timeline.
As an admin, I need to be able to add and edit information for each node so I can manage each virtual exhibit.
As an admin, I need to be able to create and modify interactive quizzes for each node so I can create an engaging educational activity for users.
As an admin, I need to be able to add and edit user accessible media within each node so I can manage what is displayed to users.
As a user, I should be able to always view and traverse where I am in the interactive timeline.
As a user, I should be able to select a node in the timeline and be able to access the information and media within it.
As a user, I should be able to participate in interactive quizzes for each node and instantly receive corrections and answers when I submit.
As a user, I should be able to access a menu in which I can travel to a selected node without traversing the timeline.
As a user, I should be able to rate and submit how interesting I find a node.
As an admin, I should be able to access data regarding what users think about and have rated each node.
As a user, I should have an option to be toured through the timeline and guided through nodes.
As a user, I should be able to toggle accessibility options for the visually impaired
As a user, I should be able to select which language I prefer to see the whole program in.
